title: DevSecOps Pipeline Framework
summary: Comprehensive DevSecOps pipeline integrating security scanning, compliance checks, and vulnerability management throughout the CI/CD process.

content.description:
# DevSecOps Pipeline Framework

A complete DevSecOps pipeline framework integrating security throughout the development lifecycle.

## Features

- Automated security scanning
- Compliance verification
- Vulnerability management
- Container security
- Audit logging

## Technical Details

- SAST and DAST integration
- Container scanning
- Compliance automation
- Secret management
- Security monitoring

## Implementation

The framework implements security controls and compliance checks at every stage of the CI/CD pipeline, ensuring secure development practices.
